content: ***please note this pattern is also available for free on my blog*** materials 438 yds/100g fingering/sock weight yarn the skein i used was a 75% merino wool/ 20% nylon/ 5% stellina yay for sparkle blend 5 5 mm hook scissors tapestry needle needle gauge and sizing gauge 4 double_crochet groups+ 4 chain 1 spaces x 9 row = 4 inches sizing at widest point 45 inches across and 20 inches tall abbreviations i use us terminology mc magic_ring chain s chain s double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet space space special stitches picot chain 3 slip_stitch into first chain and continue on with next stitch
